title: How to Create a Game With Rpgtoolkit

steps.headline: Get acquainted with the interface and environment.
Read the manual for the current version of Toolkit (currently version 3.1.0).
Now think of a story line and plot of your game try to be an original or if your making remake try to make it your own.
Start programming your game in the order you find necessary, some people prefer start to finish other prefer to go in no order at all.
Make the necessary graphics needed to make the game (sprite, background, animation, etc....)
Do not forget to add items, special moves, enemies, and other media.

text: Download RPGtoolkit from this website  Get acquainted with the interface and environment.  Read the manual for the current version of Toolkit (currently version 3.1.0).  Now think of a story line and plot of your game try to be an original or if your making remake try to make it your own.  Start programming your game in the order you find necessary, some people prefer start to finish other prefer to go in no order at all.  Make the necessary graphics needed to make the game (sprite, background, animation, etc....)  Do not forget to add items, special moves, enemies, and other media.
